# loopia_domain (Data Source)

Fetches details about a specific domain.

## Example Usage
```terraform
data "loopia_domain" "example_com" {
  name = "example.com"
}
```


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The domain name to retrieve data for

### Read-Only

- `expiration_date` (String) The expiration date of the domain
- `paid` (Boolean) Whether the domain is paid for
- `reference_number` (Number) The reference number of the domain
- `registered` (Boolean) Whether the domain is registered
- `renewal_status` (String) The renewal status of the domain
